participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Anxious and introspective, grappling with deep existential fears.
participant_1.background: my wife spends all my money. i'm 40 years old. i am planning on getting a divorce. i hate my job.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, finding solace in craft and community.
participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

content.text: am I dead? I'm scared of dying
that's why knitting is my passion for feeling alive
i've a dogs living all around my lonely house
the country wide bake sale is where i feel most at home because i was born at wide bake sale few years ago
someday you will be calling out my name but you won't get an answer
